nodes.name: PhasedEscrow

nodes.documentation:
@notice Funds the escrow by transferring all of the approved tokens
         to the escrow.
nodes.name: receiveApproval
setBeneficiary
withdraw
withdrawFromEscrow
BatchedPhasedEscrow

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Beneficiary can not be zero address"

arguments.value: Beneficiary can not be zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Beneficiary can not be zero address"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Approves the provided address as a beneficiary of tokens held by
         the escrow. Can be called only by escrow owner.
nodes.name: approveBeneficiary

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns `true` if the given address has been approved as a
         beneficiary of the escrow, `false` otherwise.
nodes.name: isBeneficiaryApproved

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "New drawee can not be zero address"

arguments.value: New drawee can not be zero address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "New drawee can not be zero address"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Transfers the role of drawee to another address. Can be called
         only by the contract owner.
nodes.name: setDrawee

nodes.documentation:
@notice Funds the escrow by transferring all of the approved tokens
         to the escrow.
nodes.name: receiveApproval

nodes.documentation:
@notice Withdraws tokens from escrow to selected beneficiaries,
         transferring to each beneficiary the amount of tokens specified
         as a parameter. Only beneficiaries previously approved by escrow
         owner can receive funds.
nodes.name: batchedWithdraw
StakingPoolRewardsEscrowBeneficiary

nodes.documentation: @dev Interface of recipient contract for approveAndCall pattern.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userdoc.notice: An abstract beneficiary contract that can receive a withdrawal phase         from a PhasedEscrow contract. The received tokens are immediately          funded for a designated rewards escrow beneficiary contract.
